thread.title: NAACP host pro-#Initiative42 reps at town hall meeting in Laurel
thread.title_full: NAACP host pro-#Initiative42 reps at town hall meeting in Laurel

author: Frank Corder
title: NAACP host pro-#Initiative42 reps at town hall meeting in Laurel
text: Town hall meeting held in Laurel to discuss Initiative 42 The NAACP hosted a special town hall meeting at the Train Depot in Laurel Thursday to discuss Initiative 42. Organizers said the meeting was held to address controversy surrounding the initiative which will be on the Nov. 3 ballot. Representatives from Better Schools, Better Jobs Mississippi were on hand to explain, discuss and answer questions for the general public.
